fields.name: dt_msg1
fields.fieldText:
This is being sent to the customer.

I have ensured no Jargon or abbreviations have been used in the job summary field.

If this is going to multiple customers, I have made sure no personal data is shared in the job summary field. An example of this would be names & addresses.

fields.name: Are_you_sure_you_want_to_continue
fields.fieldText: Are you sure you want to continue?

validationRule.errorMessage: Please confirm you are happy to complete by checking the checkbox

fields.name: dt_validateEmailMsg
fields.fieldText: ℹ️ Please check with the customer you have the correct email address and it is in a valid format.﻿

fields.name: ErrorMsg
fields.fieldText: When selecting "We couldn't get access to the property/land located at:" in the "During our visit we found" field, the 'If “We couldn’t get access to the property/land located at:” is selected" field is mandatory

fields.name: Copy_3_of_ErrorMsg
fields.fieldText: When selecting "Other" in the "During the visit we" field, the "If ‘Other’ is selected" field is mandatory

fields.name: Copy_1_of_ErrorMsg
fields.fieldText: When selecting "Belongs to another utility company" in the "We have identified that the manhole cover(s)" field, the 'If ‘Belongs to another utility company’ is selected' field is mandatory

fields.name: Copy_1_of_Copy_3_of_ErrorMsg
fields.fieldText: When selecting "We couldn't get access to the property/land located at:" in the "During visit we found" field, the "If 'We couldn’t get access to the property/land located at:' is selected" field is mandatory

fields.name: Copy_2_of_ErrorMsg
fields.fieldText: When selecting "We need to get in touch with the occupier at the neighbouring property for access to:" in the "What happens next?" field, the "If 'we need to get in touch with the occupier at the neighbouring property for access to:' is selected" field is mandatory
